name: @scion/microfrontend-platform
description: SCION Microfrontend Platform enables you to successfully implement a framework-agnostic microfrontend architecture using iframes. It provides you fundamental APIs for microfrontends to communicate with each other across origin, allows embedding microfrontends using a web component and enables routing between microfrontends. SCION Microfrontend Platform is a lightweight, web stack agnostic library that has no user-facing components and does not dictate any form of application structure.
